sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react';
import {
  Grid,
  Typography,
  Button,
  Container,
  FormControl,
  TextField,
} from "@material-ui/core";
import SendIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Send';


const TemplateGenerator = () => {
    const [templateData,createTemplate] = useState({Name:'',CollegeName:'',Batch:'',Aim:'',ExperimentNo:0,Theory:'',Procedure:'',Appartus:'',Conclusion:''});

  return (
    <Container style={{ backgroundColor: "white"}} >
      <form noValidate autoComplete="off">
        <Grid container direction="column" >
          <Grid container item direction="row" spacing={2}>
            <Grid item>
              <TextField
                required
                id="standard-required"
                label="Your Name"
                defaultValue="Prakhar Ojha"
                onChange={(e)=>createTemplate({...templateData,Name:e.target.value})}
              />
            </Grid>
            <Grid item>
              <TextField
                required
                id="standard-required"
                label="College Name"
                defaultValue="IIIT Surat"
                onChange={(e)=>createTemplate({...templateData,CollegeName:e.target.value})}
              />
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
          <Grid container item direction="row" spacing={2}>
            <Grid item>
              <TextField
                required
                id="standard-required"
                label="Branch"
                defaultValue="ECE"
                onChange={(e)=>createTemplate({...templateData,Branch:e.target.value})}
              />
            </Grid>
            <Grid item>
              <TextField
                required
                id="standard-required"
                label="Batch"
                defaultValue="A2"
                onChange={(e)=>createTemplate({...templateData,Batch:e.target.value})}
              />
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item sm={8}>
            <TextField
              required
              id="standard-required"
              label="Aim"
              defaultValue="The aim of the experiment is"
              onChange={(e)=>createTemplate({...templateData,Aim:e.target.value})}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <TextField
              id="standard-required"
              label="Theory"
              defaultValue="The Theory is"
              onChange={(e)=>createTemplate({...templateData,Theory:e.target.value})}
            />
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <TextField
              
              id="standard-required"
              label="Procedure"
              defaultValue="The Procedure is"
              onChange={(e)=>createTemplate({...templateData,Procedure:e.target.value})}
            />
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
        <Button variant="contained" size="medium" color="primary" endIcon={<SendIcon/>} type="Submit" onClick={()=>console.log(templateData)}>Submit</Button>
      </form>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default TemplateGenerator;
